DOC.brief_summary: This multiple-center , nonrandomized , open label , parallel group , single dose study conduct male female subject normal renal function severe ( eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) renal impairment evaluate effect renal impairment pharmacokinetics ( PK ) TD 4208 .
